overview:
Charles Groom is a co-founder and CTO at Precision Polling, where he is also responsible for designing and driving key product features with an eye towards customer need and clean interface design.

Chuck’s career includes: building and selling a consumer Internet company (BillMonk), developing entirely new product lines at a consumer internet startup (Xmarks), managing a team of engineers at a mobile payments company (Obopay), working as an engineer at Amazon where he presented future-reaching ideas to Jeff Bezos (Item Metadata team), and building software for cellphones and embedded devices (Blue Mug).

Chuck graduated from Swarthmore College (PA) with a degree in Computer Science. Along with Gaurav, he co-founded Seattle Tech Startups.
